posts.postText:
HBL encourages the strength, determination and achievements of it's female employees. Here's what Shagufta Ahmed, Branch Operations Manager, Gujranwala has to say about her experience:
'My story of self-discovery started in 2013 with my banking career at the largest bank in Pakistan.
Born in a male dominant society, I was raised by my mother well enough to be able to compete with men at all levels, compete with merit and be honest towards my profession. When I became a mother myself that struggle became two-fold. Raising two children while maintaining the same level of performance at my branch was my utmost ambition throughout.
My 8-year-long journey took me to many branches of HBL, some were at excellent performance before my joining, and some of them were revived through my experience and teamwork.
I found everyone in my branch to be a dedicated team player. We never allowed our personal life to affect our professional growth and vice versa. I am thankful to HBL for building trust in me and empowering me with strength, perseverance and growth throughout.'
#HBL #HBLDiversity #WomenEmpowerment
